title: Skill Frontmatter
description: Schema for YAML frontmatter at the top of SKILL.md files. Matches official Claude Code plugin format. Contains skill identity and optional runtime behavior.

name.description: Skill identifier. For Claude Code plugins, use kebab-case (e.g., 'react'). Legacy format 'category/name (@author)' is supported for backward compatibility.

description.description: Brief description of the skill's purpose for Claude agents
examples: React patterns and conventions for Claude agents
Hono API routes with OpenAPI/Zod validation

disable-model-invocation.description: If true, prevents the AI model from invoking this skill. Default: false

user-invocable.description: If true, users can invoke this skill directly. Default: true

allowed-tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools this skill can use (e.g., 'Read, Grep, Glob')

model.description: AI model to use for this skill

agent.description: Agent name to use when skill is invoked

argument-hint.description: Hint for arguments when skill is invoked

examples.name: react
examples.description: React patterns and conventions for Claude agents

examples.name: api-hono
examples.description: Hono API routes with OpenAPI/Zod validation

examples.name: security
examples.description: Security best practices and vulnerability prevention
